mapper.select: select category.category_id, category.parent_id, category.name, category.seq, count(p.post_id) as postCount from category left join post p on category.category_id = p.category_id and category.is_delete = false and p.is_delete = false where category.category_id in (select sorted_category.category_id from (select * from category where is_delete = false order by blog_id) sorted_category where sorted_category.blog_id = (select user.blog_id from user inner join blog on user.blog_id = blog.blog_id where user.user_id = #{userId})) group by category.category_id order by category.seq, category.register_time
